org.interpss.numeric.sparse
Interface SparseEqnDouble

All Superinterfaces:
SparseEquation
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSparseEqnDouble, AbstractSparseEqnDoubleNative, SparseEqnComplexNativeImpl, SparseEqnDoubleCommonMathImpl, SparseEqnDoubleImpl, SparseEqnDoubleNativeImpl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2NativeImpl
public interface SparseEqnDouble
extends SparseEquation

Sparse Equation of data type double for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1

i - the element row number
